name: Kobold Caverns
description:
You and your adventuring Kobolds have been separated and must find a way back to each other.

Connect the winding corridors and open caverns to reunite the Kobolds, but beware of the denizens of the dark.

We are two developers & a dog from Australia, working together to make games we love.

As you might imagine, there tends to be a few bugs that slip through our game dev net when working. These bugs will be fixed after the judging period. Here are a few to watch out for:

- When you restart the game a new track of music will start over the old one (oops!)

Music: Hard Modeby HoliznaCC0

Sound: https://sfxr.me/
